allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: scraper entegrasyonu, Product domain modeli, SQLite connector

- Sepenatural web scraper \(sitemap → BeautifulSoup → SQLite\)
- SQLiteConnector ile gerçek ürün verisi ingestion
- Product/Ingredient domain modelleri eklendi
- SepenaturalMapper: scraper çıktısını domain''e map eder
- API Gateway: /products/sepenatural endpoint
- Ingestion: /ingest/sepenatural/products endpoint
- Tenant ID validation güçlendirildi \(hyphen/underscore izin\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
